title: 1967The only thing the Schumer Shutdown accomplished was alerting Americans that 59% of Illegal-Head
content:
1967 The only thing the Schumer Shutdown accomplished was alerting Americans that 59% of Illegal-Headed Households receive American taxpayer funded welfare.

There’s no going back now.

Thanks Chuck! posted 2 days ago by blue5707 122 comments award share report block C3 @C_3C_3 • 2d The only thing the Schumer Shutdown accomplished was alerting Americans that 59% of Illegal-Headed Households receive American taxpayer funded welfare. There’s no going back now. Thanks Chuck!
122 comments Sort by Top Top New Worst Old Save JoeBidensDementia1 117 points 2 days ago If we have this data, we have their addresses, too. Deport them all! permalink award report block reply LiveFreeInXorDie 33 points 2 days ago "Gotta deport 'em all!" permalink parent award report block reply MastaJoda 9 points 2 days ago Even the freeloading ''legal migrants.'' Holy shit think of the money saved. Why in tf do we subsidize immigration? If you come here you damn well better be able to pull your own weight ffs. I want 10 yr moritorium on ALL immigration. But nearly 49% of those from Laos are. Thomas Sowell permalink parent award report block reply Cacciali_Via 2 points 1 day ago I have some Hmong aquantances/friends. They are good net tax contributors, but I also know that historically the Hmong people used to have a written language. Somehow along the way they devolved and lost the ability to write in their language. Eventually they started using the roman alphabet to phonetically recreate their spoken language but nobody knows what the original written characters even look like. In other words, they are the jungle Asians and not the smarter snow Asians. permalink parent award report block reply ModernKnight 67 points 2 days ago Oof, that chart hurts to look at.  The 52% of legal immigrants receiving benefits is horrible also.  We shouldn't have any gibs.  If gibs ARE to be had, though, all foreigners should be disqualified from receiving said gibs. Edit to add: I also do not, for a second, believe those housing assistance numbers. permalink award report block reply realPhantomFuck 41 points 2 days ago Seriously. WHAT benefit is a person who immigrates here just to leech? They are a net negative and should be removed Edit: I appreciate the responses and I know the why . It’s just insane to me that this is accepted because they’re “legal.” It shouldn’t even be possible to get on assistance as a new citizen permalink parent award report block reply John_Smallberries 18 points 2 days ago They're a benefit to the democrat communists due to the swaying of census numbers. permalink parent award report block reply BlackPilledMAGA 8 points 2 days ago SCOTUS needs to clarify that immediately and permanently remove all illegals from the census count. Once they no longer count towards federal funding or congressional seats all of the leftist politicians will drop them in an instant. Sheesh. If this is where the average poster here is at, it truly is hopeless. If they want out, get a real job. permalink parent award report block reply rebuildingMyself 8 points 2 days ago I'd be okay with someone on gibs losing their right to vote until they are once again independent permalink parent award report block reply Aquamine-Amarine -5 points 2 days ago Slippery slope. Lots of people here want to steal voting rights. It's a bad idea. Requirements for welfare should be really strict. The amount you get should depend on your situation. Single people can get money, obviously not as much as a family though. Single mothers should NOT get any money unless they're married to the kid's father. They take advantage of the system too much. Young adults taking care of younger siblings because their parents are dead can get money for the kid. Illegals get absolutely nothing. Deport. permalink parent award report block reply GodSaveTheWest 8 points 2 days ago Wrong, every single dumb fuck having voting rights was never the intention of the founding fathers. The greeks knew it was dumb too as they were theorizing democracy. There absolutely should be restrictions on who can vote. Muh slippery slope isnt an argument here, its how it was meant to be. You should have to be a tax payer to have a say how our government spends tax money. Not be on public benefits as you'll just vote for more free stuff. Not have certain kinds of debt as you'll just vote for however promises to forgive it. Have signed up for the draft (women signing up being optional. if they want to vote equally, they can risk dying in war equally.) In addition to that there should be a basic test when registering to vote. Too many idiots voting with no idea how our government even works or any knowledge of history or economics. permalink parent award report block reply ModernKnight 6 points 2 days ago Universal franchise was a bad idea.  The founders knew it.  "When the people find that they can vote themselves money, that will herald the end of the republic."  Remove ALL gibs, or get those receiving them off the voter rolls. permalink parent award report block reply TheThreeSeashells 4 points 2 days ago I'd rather start with mandatory drug and alcohol testing, no smoking, and zero tolerance when those rules are broken.  Sorry, but if you're taking my money, you don't get to waste it on things you don't need, most of which will only lead to negative actions resulting in more theft of taxpayer money. I'd also be willing to throw in that they lose some benefits if they give birth.  Once again, if you need government handouts to survive, you shouldn't be making it harder to survive without taking more government money.  The "childbirth" clause could be offset should the recipient at least get a part-time job. permalink parent award report block reply ColbyP 3 points 2 days ago Taking away voting rights is both good, and consistent with the Founder's philosophy. They didn't write in everyone being allowed to vote in the constitution for good reason: many people shouldn't be allowed to.
